plot: Set in the Galactic Empire era. Two Rebel spies travel to the Empire-occupied planet Eison, where they meet new allies, alien creatures, and the Empire.
plot_en: Set in the Galactic Empire era. Two Rebel spies travel to the Empire-occupied planet Eison, where they meet new allies, alien creatures, and the Empire.

title: Rise of the Rebellion
